StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateCommandRecruiter]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@CommandRecruiterId int ,@CurrentRankCode varchar(10) ,@CategoryId int ,@DateDueHome date.me ,@DepartureDate date.me )
AS
UPDATE [dbo].[SHIPPER] SET [CurrentRankCode] = @CurrentRankCode ,[CommandRecruiterCategoryId] = @CategoryId ,[DateDueHome] = @DateDueHome ,[DepartureDate] = @DepartureDate
WHERE [SHIP_ID] = @CommandRecruiterId
